page.title: 17MY FAMILY.
page.content: I have got{three step brothers}and{one {step sister.}My sister{Angela}is {29.}She is{married}with{three {children,}two boys and a girl. My brothers have{all got jobs}now, but it took{a long time}getting them. One of my brothers,{Kim,}went in the army for four years. My brother{Paul}is{22.}He works as a{plumber.}Our{Glyn}is{29}and he is a{miner.}He is doing a{parachute {jump}for{charity.}He has never done one before and he is only getting two days practice. My{dad}works for the {council.}He lays paths and puts up fences. His{hobby}is{gardening.}He once got{second prize}for being the {best gardener.}He grows{vegetables}and my mum grows{flowers.}In her spare time she{knits.}My{mum}works at the "Shakespeare Inn" as a{cleaner.}
